name: Saeed Vaziry
title: Tech Lead / Software Engineer
summary: Hello, I’m Saeed. I have been working as a software engineer since 2010. During these years, I’ve led and collaborated with teams ranging from 3 to 10 members using agile methodologies. I’ve primarily served as a Tech Lead and Backend Engineer across three countries. My experience spans various domains, including large-scale platforms and e-commerce systems. My main tech stack includes PHP, Laravel, and JavaScript, but I have continually adapted to new technologies throughout my career.
professional_summary: Highly motivated and continuously seeking improvement, I tackle tasks with curiosity and creativity, always pursuing optimal solutions. Proactive and eager to learn, I embrace diverse perspectives and develop unique frameworks as necessary.

experiences.title: Tech Lead - Payments
experiences.description:
Led a team of 6 engineers at Metro Markets, driving significant achievements and fostering an innovative culture.
Orchestrated strategic infrastructure optimization, reducing operational costs by 80% and enhancing system efficiency and reliability.
Spearheaded global expansion initiatives, and integrated new payment methods such as Paypal BNPL for 4 new countries.
Advocated for personal development, supporting team members' growth plans to cultivate a supportive work environment.
Designed and implemented an innovative reporting system to generate more than 1000 pages of PDF files with a 200% reduction in costs.
Pioneered a new payment method (SEPA DD) and improved the authorization rate by 20%.

experiences.title: Software Engineer - Payments
experiences.description:
Played a pivotal role as a Software Engineer in Metro Markets' Payments team, focusing on developing and maintaining various payment integrations such as PayPal, Card payments, OpenInvoice, Sofort, and iDeal.
Enhanced internal accounting systems, optimizing financial operations and payout processes for all payment methods.
Leveraged cutting-edge tools and technologies including Grafana for real-time monitoring and analytics, ensuring high system performance and reliability.
Demonstrated a deep understanding of both technical and business aspects of payment processing, ensuring alignment with company strategic goals and enhancing customer payment experiences.

experiences.title: Co-founder and Software Engineer
experiences.description:
Spearheaded the development of the innovative Regika web application at Regika Holding, aimed at streamlining server and application management processes.
Conceptualized and created a comprehensive solution for managing servers, sites, applications, and deployments, automating server setup and expediting the preparation of production-ready PHP applications.
Engineered robust integrations with top cloud platforms including Amazon Web Services, DigitalOcean, and Vultr, providing users with diverse deployment options and scalability enhancements.
Empowered users with extensive control over application caches, queues, and databases, optimizing performance and efficiency.

experiences.title: Lead Software Engineer

Led a team of 3 engineers to build sophisticated microservices, ensuring scalability and reliability to serve over 1m customers.
Crafted intuitive Front-End solutions for Pay.ir's website, enhancing user experience and interface aesthetics.
Engineered a web chat application, enabling real-time communication capabilities for more than 1000 users in real-time.
Orchestrated an intensive on-the-job training boot camp, empowering engineering interns with proficiency in PHP and Vue.js technologies.
Ensured platform robustness and stability through rigorous unit testing of all API endpoints.
